title: Define Overall Architecture
description: Create a high-level architectural design for the platform.

title: Develop Genetic Data Handling Module
description: Design and implement a module to handle genetic data.

title: Implement AI Model for Personalized Healthcare
description: Develop an AI model capable of providing personalized healthcare based on genetic data.

title: Design User Interface for Data Input and Output
description: Create a user-friendly interface for inputting genetic data and viewing personalized health recommendations.

title: Create Database Schema and Set Up Data Storage
description: Design the database schema and set up storage for genetic data and AI model results.

title: Implement DevOps Pipeline
description: Create a CI/CD pipeline for the platform.

title: Conduct Security Audit and Implement Measures
description: Perform a security audit of the platform and implement necessary measures.
